definition: Gospel according to St Matthew
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
highest/greatest/too (much)/very/extremely
good fortune/happiness/luck
surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: And then you get to the birth narratives in Matthew, the stories of the Baby Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 然后你读到了马太福音中，记叙耶稣诞生的故事。

sentences.english: So the Gospel of Matthew is also by a good one.
sentences.chinese: 所以马太福音也很可靠。

sentences.english: Look at the structure of Matthew though.
sentences.chinese: 再来看看马太福音的架构。

sentences.english: There are five speeches by Jesus in Matthew.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣在马太福音中做了五次讲论。

sentences.english: Then you'd go on and read the rest of the Gospel of Matthew.
sentences.chinese: 接着你继续读马太福音。

sentences.english: It is fitting that Matthew's book should come immediately after that of Malachi.
sentences.chinese: 让马太福音紧接玛拉基书之后是最合适不过了。

sentences.english: He may have hung himself, tormented by guilt, as reported in Matthew.
sentences.chinese: 马太福音中说他深受罪恶感折磨而上吊自杀。

sentences.english: Christ's method is clearly outlined in Matthew 18:17.
sentences.chinese: 基督的方法已经在马太福音十八章17节清楚列出。

sentences.english: The figure in Matthew, in the Gospel of Matthew, we don't know much about his actual history.
sentences.chinese: 马太福音中的马太，我们对他的真实历史了解并不多。

sentences.english: Listen to what Jesus' critics said of Him in Matthew 11:19.
sentences.chinese: 请听马太福音11章19节，那些人怎样批评耶稣。

sentences.english: That Matthew was written by the actual disciple Matthew.
sentences.chinese: 马太福音真的是由马太的信徒所写。

sentences.english: The disciples had good reason to worry in Matthew 8.
sentences.chinese: 马太福音八章里，门徒们是很有理由担心的。

sentences.english: Turn to Matthew 6 and read verses 25 to 33.
sentences.chinese: 请翻到马太福音第六章，请读第25至33节。

sentences.english: Look what Jesus said about it in Matthew 5:22.
sentences.chinese: 看看耶稣在马太福音5:22中关于这件事的解释。

sentences.english: It's in the Bible. It's in Matthew 16.
sentences.chinese: 是出自圣经的，马太福音第16章。
